TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigBuilder extends System.Object implements class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Mobile.Service.Config.IConfigBuilder

Docs.summary: The class is responsible for initializing the service including ASP.NET Web API, Autofac, and OWIN. The default implementation configures the service using default settings but an application can customize this in multiple ways: By providing a with custom settings; by providing an which can configure the dependency injection engine; or by providing an entirely different implementation.
